title: Forbidden Secrets
description: The dark power of the Fear family consumes all those connected with it. No one can escape the evil of the family's curseâ€”not even the Fears themselves. Savannah Madison doesn't believe that. She marries Tyler Fear. But then she goes with him to Blackrose Manor. That's when the deaths begin. That's when she learns his terrible secret.
author: R.L. Stine
